Entry.Value: GAMER TAG

This game has an autosave feature. A notification will appear on screen when the game is saving.
Do not turn the system off during this time.
Creating save data... Do not insert/remove data storage devices or turn the console off.

There is insufficient free space on the selected data storage device.
At least %s %s of free space is required to save data.
Select a different data storage device.
Failed to save data. Select a different data storage device.
Loading save data... Do not insert/remove data storage devices or turn the console off.

No save data detected. Create new save data?
<Caution> This game has an autosave feature. Save data already present on the selected data storage device will be automatically overwritten.
Unable to load save data as save data version and game version are different. Sign in to Xbox Live and update to the latest game version.

Game data cannot be saved as no data storage device has been selected.
Do you want to continue?
You will be unable to save your game if you continue.
Since you are not signed in, the game cannot be saved. Your game progress will not be saved if you continue without signing in.
You are unable to use this feature since you have been banned from multiplayer.

As you are not connected to Xbox Live, you will not be able to use online features such as uploading rankings or records. Game will begin in offline mode.
*You will not be able to use GMP or resources stored in your online inventory. Connect online again to access your online inventory.
Checking installed game data. Do not turn the system off.

Installed game data is corrupted.
Exit the game and delete game data. Restart METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN to reinstall game data.
Installing game data... Do not turn the console off. %s %%

This will cancel installation. Are you sure?
To reinstall, exit and then restart METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN.

Failed to install game data.
To reattempt installation, exit and then restart METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN.
There is insufficient free space on the Xbox 360 Hard Drive. At least %s%s of free space is required to install METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN.
Downloadable content is corrupted. Exit the game and delete game data. Downloadable content can be re-downloaded from "Xbox Games Store".
PRESS START BUTTON
<I=G=PAD_X> Show Gamer Card

Game data installation completed.
To play METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN, insert Disc 2: Play.
To play METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN, insert Disc 2: Play.

Game data has not been installed.
To play METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN, insert Disc 1: Install and install the game data.
To install METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN, insert Disc 1: Install and install the game data.
Connect to Xbox Games Store.
Xbox Games Store
The currently signed-in user is restricted from viewing user-created content, so you are unable to use the exchange feature to send/receive user-created content such as emblems.
The currently signed-in user is restricted from using voice chat, so you will be unable to use the voice chat feature.

Game data cannot be saved as no data storage device has been selected.
Game will not be saved.
Right Stick
Set the method for selecting commands on the Call Menu. Call Button: Release the Call Button (<I=G=CALL>) to use the selected command. Right Stick: Tilt <I=G=CAMERA> to select and use a command.
Xbox 360 Hard Drive not detected. An Xbox 360 Hard Drive is required to play METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN.

Online multiplayer access has been restricted. You will not be able to fight other players personally during online base defenses. This includes defense of your own bases, in addition to bases belonging to other players. We recommend enabling multiplayer to get the fullest enjoyment out of the game.

This save data cannot be used, as the relevant downloadable content was not found.
Downloadable content can be re-downloaded from "Xbox Games Store".
Save data download failed.
Sign-in Status Has Changed Returning to Title Screen
To play METAL GEAR SOLID V: THE PHANTOM PAIN, you must completely finish downloading the game installation data from the Xbox Games Store. Please do not cancel the download.
Your download was cancelled. Download will need to restart.
To download the game installation data, you must be signed-in to your Xbox Live account.
Currently downloading game installation data.
In order for your exclusive content from "METAL GEAR SOLID V: GROUND ZEROES" to be reflected, you must be signed in to Xbox Live and play in online mode.

Permission is hereby granted to use, copy, modify, and distribute this software (or portions thereof) for any purpose, without fee, subject to these conditions: (1) If any part of the source code for this software is distributed, then this README file must be included, with this copyright and no-warranty notice unaltered; and any additions, deletions, or changes to the original files must be clearly indicated in accompanying documentation. (2) If only executable code is distributed, then the accompanying documentation must state that "this software is based in part on the work of the Independent JPEG Group". (3) Permission for use of this software is granted only if the user accepts full responsibility for any undesirable consequences; the authors accept NO LIABILITY for damages of any kind.
These conditions apply to any software derived from or based on the IJG code, not just to the unmodified library. If you use our work, you ought to acknowledge us.
Permission is NOT granted for the use of any IJG author's name or company name in advertising or publicity relating to this software or products derived from it. This software may be referred to only as "the Independent JPEG Group's software".
We specifically permit and encourage the use of this software as the basis of commercial products, provided that all warranty or liability claims are assumed by the product vendor.
The Unix configuration script "configure" was produced with GNU Autoconf. It is copyright by the Free Software Foundation but is freely distributable. The same holds for its supporting scripts (config.guess, config.sub, ltmain.sh). Another support script, install-sh, is copyright by X Consortium but is also freely distributable.
The IJG distribution formerly included code to read and write GIF files. To avoid entanglement with the Unisys LZW patent, GIF reading support has been removed altogether, and the GIF writer has been simplified to produce uncompressed GIFs. This technique does not use the LZW algorithm; the resulting GIF files are larger than usual, but are readable by all standard GIF decoders.
We are required to state that "The Graphics Interchange Format(c) is the Copyright property of CompuServe Incorporated. GIF(sm) is a Service Mark property of CompuServe Incorporated."
